name: lauriecrean-e2e-tests
description: End-to-end tests for lauriecrean portfolio website

scripts.test:health:api: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run dev:api:e2e" "wait-on http://localhost:3015/health --timeout 60000 --interval 1000 --verbose && playwright test tests/health.api.spec.ts --config=playwright.dual-service.config.ts --headed"
scripts.test:pr-feed:api: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run dev:api:e2e" "playwright test tests/pull-request-feed.api.spec.ts --config=playwright.dual-service.config.ts --headed"
